name: Kids Math Place Value
description: Features of the app   Learn (Levels - Easy,Medium,Hard)  Place Value Cards  Place Value Chart  Place Value Decimal  Expanded Form   Practice (Levels - Easy,Medium,Hard)  Where is my Place?  Build numbers using base ten blocks.   Place Value House  Standard Form  Expanded Form   Games (Levels - Easy,Medium,Hard)  Bingo   Puzzles
